name: predicates
heading: A module applying 'predicates' to files in 101repo after 101meta simple matches
comment: see the 'predicate' constraint for programmable matching constraint http://101companies.org/index.php/Language:101meta#Programmable_matching_constraints

issues.portability: although the module runs on windows the results collected might not be the same as on linux as commands may fail

predicatesFiles*.101web/contributions//*.predicate.json: result of evaluation of predicates for the file ${2}
